mapper.select: SELECT D1.*, C.*,C.CODE_NAME AS JOB_NAME, O.CODE_NAME AS POSITION_NAME, E.*,EXTRACT(YEAR FROM TO_DATE(SUBSTR(EMP_RESIDENT_NO,1,2),'RR')) || '년' || SUBSTR(EMP_RESIDENT_NO,3,INSTR(EMP_RESIDENT_NO,'-')-5) || '월' || SUBSTR(EMP_RESIDENT_NO,5,2) || '일' AS EMP_BIRTH_DATE FROM (SELECT * FROM TBL_EMPLOYEE) E JOIN TBL_DEPARTMENT D1 ON D1.DEPT_CODE=E.DEPT_CODE JOIN TBL_CODE C ON E.JOB_CODE = C.CODE_NO JOIN TBL_CODE O ON E.POSITION_CODE = O.CODE_NO

SELECT D1.*, C.*,C.CODE_NAME AS JOB_NAME, O.CODE_NAME AS POSITION_NAME, E.*,EXTRACT(YEAR FROM TO_DATE(SUBSTR(EMP_RESIDENT_NO,1,2),'RR')) || '년' || SUBSTR(EMP_RESIDENT_NO,3,INSTR(EMP_RESIDENT_NO,'-')-5) || '월' || SUBSTR(EMP_RESIDENT_NO,5,2) || '일' AS EMP_BIRTH_DATE FROM (SELECT * FROM TBL_EMPLOYEE) E JOIN TBL_DEPARTMENT D1 ON D1.DEPT_CODE=E.DEPT_CODE JOIN TBL_CODE C ON E.JOB_CODE = C.CODE_NO JOIN TBL_CODE O ON E.POSITION_CODE = O.CODE_NO
